SELECT MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID, NAME, NAME_ABBR, SHOW_ORDER,
DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS
FROM MS_SI_SHOKUMEI
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0
ORDER BY SHOW_ORDER

INSERT INTO MS_SI_SHOKUMEI( MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , NAME , NAME_ABBR , SHOW_ORDER , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :NAME , :NAME_ABBR , :SHOW_ORDER , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_SHOKUMEI SET NAME = :NAME , NAME_ABBR = :NAME_ABBR , SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID
